text: Harold Arlen (born Hyman Arluck; February 15, 1905 â€“ April 23, 1986) was an American composer. He composed over 500 songs. He is known for composing the songs for the 1939 movie The Wizard of Oz, including "Over the Rainbow". Arlen won the Academy Award for Best Original Song in 1939. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:American composers Category:Writers from Buffalo, New York Category:American songwriters Category:Musicians from Buffalo, New York Category:Academy Award winning composers
title: Harold Arlen
